Title: Muppet Treasure Island
Genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Musical, Romance
Writer: Robert Louis Stevenson (novel), Jerry Juhl (screenplay), Kirk R. Thatcher (screenplay), James V. Hart (screenplay)
Actors: Tim Curry, Billy Connolly, Jennifer Saunders, Kevin Bishop
Plot: The Muppets are back into action in another movie based on a novel written by Robert Louis Stevenson. Kermit the Frog and his colleagues go on a warfare against ruthless pirates. They also share their problem-solving journey on sea to rescue a treasure.
Production: Walt Disney Pictures, Jim Henson Productions
